summary: Build a colorful, mobile-first marketplace UI theme (Amazon-style) applied consistently across the entire app, including buttons, cards, category/product components, banners/slider, and dashboards.
architectural_notes: Global UI theme: mobile-first, bright Amazon-style visual design applied app-wide.
Color palette: primary orange; secondary purple; success green; alert red; light backgrounds.
Design system styles: rounded corners everywhere; soft card shadows; gradient buttons; bold headings; large mobile-friendly spacing.
Component guidelines: rounded white cards with shadow for products/vendors/dashboards/categories.
Category cards: colorful gradient square cards with big icons and tap animation.
Product cards: image on top; bold price; offer price highlight; full-width add-to-cart button.
Banners/hero slider: gradient slider banners with bold text and CTA buttons.
Dashboards: colored stat cards for sales, orders, wallet, alerts.

existing_features.title: Update the global Tailwind theme tokens and shared utility classes to match the requested marketplace palette and styling rules: primary orange, secondary purple, success green, destructive red alerts, and light backgrounds; rounded corners throughout; soft card shadows; bold headings; mobile-friendly spacing; and gradient-filled buttons.

Standardize buttons across the app to use gradient-filled rounded buttons with bold text and soft shadow for primary actions, including banner CTAs, add-to-cart actions, and key dashboard actions; ensure hover/active/tap states feel responsive on mobile (scale/tap animation) while respecting reduced-motion preferences.

Apply a consistent card design system across the app for products, vendors, dashboards, and categories: rounded white cards, soft shadow, and clear borders; update pages/components that render these cards to use the shared card styling consistently.

Revise category card UI (including the main Categories page and any category-card grids on the Home page) to use colorful gradient square cards with large icons and a tap animation, while preserving the existing category navigation behavior and category color mapping.

Ensure product cards across the app follow the requested product-card pattern: image at the top, bold price, discounted/offer price clearly highlighted (with strikethrough original when applicable), and a full-width add-to-cart button; keep the layout compact and mobile-first.

Update the hero/banner slider presentation to match the bright marketplace theme: gradient slider banners with bold text, and CTA buttons styled as gradient rounded buttons with mobile tap animation; keep swipe gestures, auto-rotation, and existing banner images intact.

Refresh vendor and admin dashboard visuals to use colored stat cards (sales, orders, wallet, alerts) aligned with the new theme palette (orange primary, purple secondary, green success, red alerts), keeping all existing dashboard data and logic unchanged.

new_feature_requests.summary: Apply a full colorful mobile-first marketplace UI theme across the entire app (Amazon-style) with defined colors, rounded corners, soft shadows, gradient buttons, bold headings, and rich spacing; update buttons, cards, category/product cards, banners, and dashboards accordingly.

projectName: Apply colorful Amazon-style mobile-first marketplace UI theme across the entire app
